LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.description: A short sword of ancient roman origin & design. Good for stabbing or slashing. It's light and nimble in the hands, which lets it beat slower weapons. The blade itself is a good & balanced all-around slashing weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.description: The ancient forged blade of knights & kings from medieval worlds. The longsword can be used for slashing or stabbing, but is slightly slow to swing. However it's deadly if given to a good melee weapon wielder.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.description: A simple but refined club or truncheon, engineered for efficient swinging and painful impacts for either lethal force or in non-lethal cases. Effective at taking down and capturing prisoners or for subduing trouble-makers.
